description: a(n) = Sum S(k), k divides 3^n, where S is the Kempner function A002034.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n-1} A002034(3^k). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 14 2008
maple: s:= proc(n) local m; m:= 1; while not type(m!/n, integer) do m:= m+1 od; m end: a:= n-> add(s(3^k), k=0..n-1): seq(a(n), n=1..70); # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 14 2008
author: Norbert Hungerbuhler (buhler(AT)math.ethz.ch)
extensions: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 14 2008
